items.name: FXCHOICE_SERVER_PORT
items.description: The port used to listen to the request from Wincor

items.name: REQUEST_DATA_FORMAT
items.description: The request data format for FxChoice Socket Implementation

items.name: RESPONSE_DATA_FORMAT
items.description: The response data format for FxChoice Socket Implementation

items.name: TIMEOUT
items.description: Timeout in seconds (default is 150s or 2 1/2 minutes)

items.name: DCC_TIMEOUT
items.description: Timeout in seconds (default is 62s or 1 minute 2s | 60 CCredit DCC Timeout)

items.name: WINCOR_TIMEOUT
items.description: Timeout in seconds (default is 240s or 4 minutes)

items.name: YN_TIMEOUT
items.description: Timeout in seconds (default is 60s or 1 minute)

items.name: YN_TIMEOUT_BUFFER
items.description: Timeout in seconds (default is 10s - buffer used while waiting for YNTIMEOUT to expire)
